page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 am.I get on my clothes of jeans and a T-shirt. I go downstairs and have some Shreddies for breakfast. I go to school which begins at 9 a.m. We work until a break when I eat my crisps and a chocolate bar. After some more work we have lunch. Today I brought some lettuce and tomato sandwiches. I play football or "British Bulldog" then there is more school work to do until 3.30. There can be Chess or Computer clubs after school.At home I play with Holly our Labrador dog. Sometimes I watch television or play football with my friend James in Bearsfield. We have our tea at 6 p.m.of salad or something like that. After that I might watch television or play with the dog again. My favourite television programmes are cartoons. I go to bed at 8 p.m. and I read a book until I go to sleep.
